name: O Misterioso Capito Do Prola Negra

volume.name: Both Barrels: The Art of the Massey Brothers

description:
Bud Waterston is a decent-looking guy in full hormonal bloom. He's heading for college and the imagined sexual liberation of living in a dormitory full of other post-teenagers in full hormonal bloom. But like all best-laid plans--forgive the pun--nothing goes as Bud hoped or expected. His roommate turns out to be a closeted homosexual. All the good-looking girls in the dorm are interested in somebody else, or in the case of one especially gorgeous co-ed he can't seem to stop thinking about, interested in him dead last. When he learns she's on the school baseball team, it inspires him to join the beleaguered band of misfits in an effort to prove to her she's all wrong about him. Or at least that he's not as disgusting as she thinks he is.

Back Blurb

Meet Bud Waterston, a decent-looking guy who happens to be in full hormonal bloom. He's also on his way to college, and drools over the sexual liberation he will no doubt face living in a coed dormitory full of hot babes. Unfortunately for Bud, things don't go exactly as planned -- he meets the girl of his dreams, who won't give him the time of day. But just because he strikes out on this first attempt doesn't mean he won't keep trying to his a home run... as long as he doesn't drop the ball!
name: Vol. 1

description:
Automail engineer Winry is captured and held hostage to force Edward to do her captor's bidding. Hawkeye discovers the disturbing truth about President Bradley's son. Our heroes have fortuitous and not-so-fortuitous reunions with old friends and enemies. And multiple intrigues and double-crosses ensue as some plot to save the world while others scheme to destroy it.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 70 - The First Homunculus
  • Chapter 71 - In the Grip of the Red Lotus
  • Chapter 72 - A Chain of Negativity, a Pebble of Goodness
  • Chapter 73 - A Daydream
name: Vol. 18

description: Written by Josh Finney. Art by Kat Rocha. The instinct to survive is what has made us who we are. In the year 2031, mankind's survival instinct is put to the test when a civil war in China spirals into global conflict. Nations are destroyed. Millions are killed. For many, like US Air Force pilot Alec Killian, survival will mean shedding some of his humanity in exchange for biotech and machine. Titanium Rain follows one pilot's journey through mankind's worst, only to discover its best. Combines the previously released debut issue with the all-new issue #2.
name: Issue 1 of 2

description: High in the skies over war-torn China, Alec's fight for survival has become desperate. With his plane badly damaged and his wingman killed, all the odds are against him as two enemy Dracos close in for the kill. Will Alec make it home in one piece, or be forced to eject over enemy territory? And what world events spiraled into the Sino Conflict?
name: Issue 2 of 2

description:
In exchange for his help in eliminating her master, Kagura offers Sesshmaru the shard of the Sacred Jewel taken from Koga. Inu-Yasha attempts to regain it, but the ill-timed coming of the new moon threatens to reveal his secret. How much has Kagura seen? Meanwhile, Miroku and Sango head into the woods to investigate the disappearance of an entire village's male population. Is this "beautiful princess" they've heard of somehow connected? Elsewhere, Naraku recreates himself yet again. Unlike previous "versions" of himself, this one is different... dangerous.

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Stone Flower
  • Scroll Two: Shattered Dream
  • Scroll Three: Naraku's Scent
  • Scroll Four: The Vortex of Bones
  • Scroll Five: Desertion
  • Scroll Six: Sunrise
  • Scroll Seven: The Half-Demon's Secret
  • Scroll Eight: The Princess in the Mountain
  • Scroll Nine: A Maiden's Heart
  • Scroll Ten: The Man Without A Face
name: Yet Another Naraku

description:
The fight against the mysterious Man-With-No-Face continues. Muso, though easily dismissed as just another incarnation of Naraku, appears to be impervious to his will. Who is this new incarnation, and what is his connection to Inu-Yasha and Kikyo? Later, Inu-Yasha and the others head to the coast in search of a way to make Tetsusaiga more powerful. But if the only way to power-up is to kill a young outcast of a half-demon girl, Inu-Yasha might not have the stomach to go through with it...

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Peerless
  • Scroll Two: Onigumi and Muso
  • Scroll Three: The Heart
  • Scroll Four: Naraku the Half-Demon
  • Scroll Five: The Ogre Bats
  • Scroll Six: Shiori's Shield
  • Scroll Seven: A Father's Wish
  • Scroll Eight: Shiori's Power
  • Scroll Nine: The Scarlet Blade
name: Cast-Off Heart

description:
Kidnapped by Kagura upon Naraku's orders, Rin is tracked down by none other than Sesshomaru himself. At his castle, Naraku offers Sesshomaru a deal: kill Inu-Yasha, and Rin will be returned! But Sesshomaru has no intention of following Naraku's--or anyone's--command, and launches an attack. Meanwhile, Inu-Yasha finds his way to the castle but is surprised to see his half-brother Sesshomaru inside. Can the two powerful brothers put aside their differences and work together long enough to defeat their common enemy?!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Kidnapped
  • Scroll Two: Naraku's Design
  • Scroll Three: Slicing the Shield
  • Scroll Four: Signal to Kohaku
  • Scroll Five: The Abandoned Castle
  • Scroll Six: Intermission
  • Scroll Seven: The Monster in the Ruins
  • Scroll Eight: Where is Naraku?
  • Scroll Nine: Lost Scent
  • Scroll Ten: The Ogre's Head
name: Two Brothers, One Enemy

description:
In the face of a too-tempting reward, Miroku's eagerness to investigate the cursed castle of a giant oni or "ogre" is at odds with the reluctance of Inu-Yasha. Is Naraku's absence from the scene a sign of increased demon activity to come? Next, in a more light-hearted vein, a misplaced monkey-god makes mischief. Later, the reappearance of demon-slayer Sango's little brother, Kohaku, is just the start of new complications. Who are these enemies, and what is the source of their fascination with Inu-Yasha...?

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Ogre of the Burial Mounds
  • Scroll Two: The Princess Vessel
  • Scroll Three: A Greater Aura
  • Scroll Four: The Venerable Monkey God
  • Scroll Five: The Holy Object
  • Scroll Six: The Ghost
  • Scroll Seven: Kyokotsu
  • Scroll Eight: The Band of Seven
  • Scroll Nine: Jyakotsu
  • Scroll Ten: Poison Smoke
name: Liars and Ogres and Monkeys...Oh, My!

description:
Inuyasha and his gang are up to their necks in enemies! First Miroko and Sango face off against a poison-vapor-wielding adversary. Just when it looks like all is lost, an unlikely savior shows up and single-handedly slays the sinister villain! From there, things quickly get worse as Inuyasha is attacked by the half-man, half-machine, but totally evil monstrosity known as Ginkotsu! Meanwhile, Kagome and company, having been tricked into taking refuge from one of the Band of Seven, are unconscious and at the mercy of the evil Renkotsu! How will Inuyasha ever defeat Ginkotsu and rescue his friends at the same time?!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Mukotsu
  • Scroll Two: Naraku's Pursuers
  • Scroll Three: Ginkotsu
  • Scroll Four: Renkotsu's Temple
  • Scroll Five: The Scent of the Seven
  • Scroll Six: The Lives of One's Companions
  • Scroll Seven: The Burial Mound
  • Scroll Eight: The Unsullied Light
  • Scroll Nine: Suikotsu
  • Scroll Ten: The Two Souls
name: The Battle With the Band of Seven Rages On!

description:
Inuyasha and friends encounter a strange mountain that's so holy, Kirara, Kikyo, and Shippo can't even set foot on it. Meanwhile, the Band of Seven have resurrected their final member and seek revenge on those responsible for causing their deaths. Elsewhere, Sesshmaru is in pursuit of Kohaku when he too is refuted by the purity of the mountain. What is the secret of this summit? And will the Band of Seven be more than a match for Inuyasha and crew?

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Shield of Hakurei
  • Scroll Two: Bankotsu
  • Scroll Three: The Clash
  • Scroll Four: Sanctuary's Edge
  • Scroll Five: Retreat
  • Scroll Six: The Scratch of Banryu
  • Scroll Seven: The Sacred Island
  • Scroll Eight: The Center of the Shield
  • Scroll Nine: The Dokko
  • Scroll Ten: The Living Mummy
name: The Sacred Mountain

description:
Inuyasha and comrades are deeply entrenched in the battle of their lives as they fend off the vicious attacks of the undead assassins known as the Band of Seven. But Inuyasha gains some unlikely allies when his brother Sesshmaru and feral rival Koga get entangled in the skirmish. As the Band of Seven's numbers dwindle, their attacks become increasingly more desperate and push Inuyasha's new comrades to their limits. All comes to a fiery climax as another of Naraku's malevolent plots is revealed!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Explosion
  • Scroll Two: Faces
  • Scroll Three: Suikotsu's Village
  • Scroll Four: The Tainted Gleam
  • Scroll Five: Suikotsu's Memory
  • Scroll Six: The River of Fire
  • Scroll Seven: The Mountain Cave
  • Scroll Eight: The Corridor
  • Scroll Nine: The Limit
  • Scroll Ten: Hakushin the Holy
name: The Unlikely Allies

description:
Trapped inside the holy shield of Mount Hakurei, Inuyasha's demonic power has been stripped away, leaving him vulnerable. Will Miroku's wind tunnel prove strong enough to break the barrier and free Inuyasha? And will Inuyasha's strength be enough to defeat the leader of the Band of Seven, who has absorbed the Shikon shards from his fallen comrades and become an even more formidable foe? A fierce battle is about to erupt--and Naraku is about to make a shocking appearance!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Inside the Darkness
  • Scroll Two: The Mountain Changes
  • Scroll Three: The Pulse
  • Scroll Four: The Sanctuary Destroyed
  • Scroll Five: Corridor's End
  • Scroll Six: The Two Auras
  • Scroll Seven: Bankotsu's Strength
  • Scroll Eight: Cut in Two
  • Scroll Nine: The Wall of Flesh
  • Scroll Ten: Resurrection
name: The Rebirth of Naraku

description:
Inuyasha and the others are trapped inside Mount Hakurei with yet another newly reassembled Naraku. Meanwhile, Naraku reveals to Kikyo that his true purpose in hiding inside Mount Hakurei is to perfect an emotionless new form that could attack and even kill Kikyo without hesitation. Having finally divorced himself from Onigumo's heart, will Naraku succeed in killing Kikyo? Inuyasha is troubled by a premonition of doom but arrives too late, finding only Kikyo's broken bow!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Maelstrom of Evil
  • Scroll Two: His True Purpose
  • Scroll Three: The New Body
  • Scroll Four: Kikyo's Life
  • Scroll Five: Inuyasha's True Feelings
  • Scroll Six: Darkness in the Heart
  • Scroll Seven: Suggestion
  • Scroll Eight: The Discarded Heart
  • Scroll Nine: Thousand-Mile Ears
  • Scroll Ten: The Colony of Ogre Women
name: Naraku's Perfect New Form

description:
Evil Kagura and demonic baby Hakudoshi are searching for the border between the afterworld and this world, where it is said that the last Shikon Jewel shards lies. Inuyasha and the others are also doing everything they can to recover this last shard. Could it be that Inuyasha and Kagome have been to this border before?!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Hall of the Bodhisattva
  • Scroll Two: A Demon in the Belly
  • Scroll Three: Where is Sango?
  • Scroll Four: Unique Among Women
  • Scroll Five: Split in Half
  • Scroll Six: The Blazing Hoof
  • Scroll Seven: Hakudoshi
  • Scroll Eight: The Headless Demons
  • Scroll Nine: Between This World and the Next
  • Scroll Ten: Hosenki
name: A Hideous Demon Baby's Mission

description:
The search for the final shard of the Shikon Jewel leads Inuyasha and the gang to a mountain fortress. But the gate is guarded by two giant statues and a force that will only allow the dead to enter! Meanwhile, while seeking a path to the underworld, Naraku teams up with demon Abi Hime, who hunts the blood of innocent villagers to heal her mother. Inuyasha and friends step in to stop them when they find that Kikyo may be involved!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Gatekeepers
  • Scroll Two: The Opened Gate
  • Scroll Three: Beyond the Gate
  • Scroll Four: Princess Abi
  • Scroll Five: The Trident
  • Scroll Six: The Village of the Holy Woman
  • Scroll Seven: An Abandoned Arrow
  • Scroll Eight: The Village Shield
  • Scroll Nine: The Forbidden Mountain
  • Scroll Ten: The Waterfall Basin
name: The Demon of the Birds

description:
Kagome faces a difficult decision--only she can help Kikyo heal from Naraku's miasma. Will the love triangle between Kagome, Inuyasha, and Kikyo stop her from doing the right thing?! Kohaku comes under Naraku's power and is ordered to steal the infant Hakudoshi. Will Kohaku be able to resist? While Inuyasha and his comrades watch, Naraku shows up at the demon bird's nest for a showdown. A series of disturbing events is about to unfold, and a path to the borderland will be revealed!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Choice
  • Scroll Two: The Angry Heart
  • Scroll Three: The Castle
  • Scroll Four: Orders
  • Scroll Five: Restored Memory
  • Scroll Six: A Broken Spell
  • Scroll Seven: The Scent of the Nest
  • Scroll Eight: The Arrow Passes On
  • Scroll Nine: The Steel Fowl
  • Scroll Ten: The River of Blood
name: River of Blood

description:
A fierce battle rages in the borderland lying between the world of the living and the afterlife. A mysterious force is attacking Inuyasha and preventing him from obtaining the last Shikon shard. This force claims to be acting on behalf of the will of the shard itself! Inuyasha also faces the dreaded Naraku, who will stop at nothing to obtain the shard. When all hope seems lost, Inuyasha receives help from a surprising force--his half-brother!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Will of the Shard
  • Scroll Two: The Arrow That Fell Short
  • Scroll Three: The Spreading Taint
  • Scroll Four: The Unbreakable Shield
  • Scroll Five: The Final Shard
  • Scroll Six: Tested
  • Scroll Seven: Diamond Spears
  • Scroll Eight: The Way Home
  • Scroll Nine: The Shrine Rat
  • Scroll Ten: The Demon Lure
name: Allies and Enemies

description:
Inuyasha and the gang follow a trail of rumors that lead to a "living mountain." Naraku has awoken the mountain from its 200-year slumber and stolen its sacred stone. The "living mountain" then gives a gift to Inuyasha and his group to help them in retrieving the stone. But what could Naraku be hoping to achieve?

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Tree Blight
  • Scroll Two: Rampage!
  • Scroll Three: A Human Heart
  • Scroll Four: Small Pleasures
  • Scroll Five: Cocooning
  • Scroll Six: The Perfect Host
  • Scroll Seven: The Lost Mountain
  • Scroll Eight: Mountain Man
  • Scroll Nine: The Nulling Stone
  • Scroll Ten: Harvesting Souls
name: A Mountain That Lives

description:
A new crop of demons is plaguing the land. The more demons are killed, the more humanlike they become. This progression culminates in a battle between the gang and Moryomaru, Hakudoshi's new and fearsome creation. Can Koga and Inuyasha stop their in-fighting long enough to battle a common enemy?

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Prototypes
  • Scroll Two: Moryomaru
  • Scroll Three: Corpses
  • Scroll Four: Stolen Objects
  • Scroll Five: The Forgotten Fiance
  • Scroll Six: Past Indiscretions
  • Scroll Seven: Forgiveness
  • Scroll Eight: The Acolytes
  • Scroll Nine: Goryomaru
  • Scroll Ten: The Deformed Arm
name: Almost Human

description:
Inuyasha and the gang are holding fort at a temple with the weakened Goryomaru. Kaguara attacks the temple while searching for the infant with Naraku's heart. Inuyasha remains unsure whether Goryomaru is an enemy of Naraku. Kagura becomes seriously wounded, but is it for good? Perhaps Naraku has one more task for her...

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Swarm of Corpses
  • Scroll Two: Kagura's Life
  • Scroll Three: The Rakanzo
  • Scroll Four: Goryomaru's Fate
  • Scroll Five: The Ogre Cliff
  • Scroll Six: The Indestructible Wall
  • Scroll Seven: Using the Shard
  • Scroll Eight: The Evil Presence
  • Scroll Nine: The Medicine Merchant
  • Scroll Ten: Illusion
name: A Question of Time

description:
Inuyasha and the crew pass through a town that has been attacked by some kind of dog. When the group stays to help the village, they run into Kohaku, who is hunting this dog. Kohaku conceals the fact that he has regained his memory in order to get a better chance at revenge on Naraku. Meanwhile the intrigue between Kagura and Goryomaru deepens.

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Roots
  • Scroll Two: Memories
  • Scroll Three: Secrets
  • Scroll Four: Escape
  • Scroll Five: Goryomaru's Identity
  • Scroll Six: Metamorphosis
  • Scroll Seven: The Vanished Power
  • Scroll Eight: The Vessel
  • Scroll Nine: Where Is the Child?
  • Scroll Ten: Kagura's Decision
name: A Question of Time

description:
Inuyasha and the crew are locked deep in combat with the scheming Hakudoshi. The plot thickens as both Kagura's and Hakudoshi's plans come to light. In a rare moment, Inuyasha fights on the same side as Kagura. It seems that Hakudoshi will stop at nothing to achieve his goals, but will he succeed?!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Hakudoshi's Scheme
  • Scroll Two: Hakudoshi's End
  • Scroll Three: Kagura's Heart
  • Scroll Four: Pain Without End
  • Scroll Five: Siblings
  • Scroll Six: The Wind
  • Scroll Seven: The Hole in Her Chest
  • Scroll Eight: The Same Soul
  • Scroll Nine: Destinies
  • Scroll Ten: The Snake's Lair
name: A Heart In the Hand

description:
The evil Midoriko and Naraku both seek to restore the Shikon Jewel. To do this they must take the final shards from Koga and Kohaku. Then Inuyasha and the gang stumble across a new sword with some intriguing powers. Could this sword lead to a victory against both Midoriko and Naraku?

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Sudden Change
  • Scroll Two: The Burial Ground of the Wolves
  • Scroll Three: The Guardian of the Treasure
  • Scroll Four: The Claws
  • Scroll Five: Mujina
  • Scroll Six: Just Causes
  • Scroll Seven: Trickery
  • Scroll Eight: Toshu
  • Scroll Nine: Ryujin's Shield
  • Scroll Ten: The Wielder of Dakki
name: The Struggle Continues

description:
Inuyasha must defend himself against the corrupted human Tonshu, who turns out to be responsible for the creation of the mysterious sword known as Dakki. Tonshu is intent on taking Inuyasha's sword, the mighty Tetsusaiga, and Dakki's unique properties pose a serious threat to Tetsusaiga. If Inuyasha loses this battle then the Tetsusaiga will be gone for good.

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: Crack
  • Scroll Two: Resignation
  • Scroll Three: One Mind, One Body
  • Scroll Four: A Peaceful Meal
  • Scroll Five: The Nunnery
  • Scroll Six: Cat Demon
  • Scroll Seven: The Dragon-Scaled Tetsusaiga
  • Scroll Eight: Venomous Mizuchi
  • Scroll Nine: Byakuya of the Dreams
  • Scroll Ten: Tetsusaiga Released
name: The Fate of a Sword

description:
The deceased turtle demon Meioju is revived when a piece of Moryomaru's flesh comes in contact with it. Meioju's shell is said to be the toughest shell of any armored demon, and Moryomaru uses it to create an unbelievably powerful armor. Even with the help of Sesshomaru, does Inuyasha stand a chance of penetrating this new armor?!

Chapter Titles

  • Scroll One: The Invincible Blade
  • Scroll Two: Meioju
  • Scroll Three: The Armored Shell
  • Scroll Four: Moryomaru's Target
  • Scroll Five: The Stolen Diamond Spears
  • Scroll Six: Moryomaru's Transformation
  • Scroll Seven: Rivalry
  • Scroll Eight: Wrath
  • Scroll Nine: Sesshomaru's Peril
  • Scroll Ten: Flight
name: Armor of a Demon

description:
Thousands of years ago, Vampire King Akabara "Red Rose" Strauss lost both his kingdom and his queen. Since humans were unable to kill the queen, they sealed her away, erecting thousands of fake seals so that the king would never find her true location. Despite being pursued by relentless dhampires, Akabara continues to search for his queen to this day

Akabara's quest takes a sinister turn when an entity called the Black Swan appears. The Black Swan inhabits the body of a young human girl every 50 years, giving her the power to destroy the Vampire King and his queen. With each incarnation the Black Swan grows stronger--will the 49th Black Swan mean the end of Akabara?
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: The Record of a Fallen Vampire

description: Akabara is heavily injured during his battle against Kayuki, the newest incarnation of the Black Swan. Kayuki remains shrouded in mystery-not only does she bear a striking resemblance to the previous Black Swan, but she also offers Akabara a temporary truce! Why does she need to keep the Vampire King alive?
name: Vol. 2

volume.name: The Record of a Fallen Vampire

description: Dhampire leader Bridget delivers a shocking revelation about Akabara and his queen, Adelheid! The mystery of Akabara's dark past continues to unwind, but can the truth Bridget divulges be trusted?
name: Vol. 3

volume.name: The Record of a Fallen Vampire

description: With aliens poised to take over Earth, Akabara forges a tentative alliance with the humans to help fight off the invasion. But can everyone on the team be trusted, especially since the Black Swan's ultimate mission is to kill Akabara?
name: Vol. 4

volume.name: The Record of a Fallen Vampire

description: More, much more, is revealed about the events of one thousand years ago, starting with the unusual circumstances of Bridget's birth and leading into the dark and deadly political struggles of that bygone era!
name: Vol. 5

volume.name: The Record of a Fallen Vampire

description:
Dear Citizen:

Thank you for your loyalty. You've no doubt noticed that the world is a troubled place. People are apathetic, lazy, unmotivated. You've probably asked yourselfWHY ISN'T ANYTHING BEING DONE TO STOP THIS SYSTEMATIC DECLINE?

Rest assured that measures are being taken. Beginning immediately, we will randomly select a different citizen each day who will be killed within 24 hours of notification. We believe this will help remind all people how precious life is and how important it is to be a productive, active member of society.

Thank you for your continued attention and your cooperation and participation...

CONGRATULATIONS! YOU HAVE BEEN RANDOMLY SELECTED BY THE GOVERNMENT...TO DIE IN 24 HOURS!

Chapter Titles

Episode 1 The End of Vengeance

  • Act 1
  • Act 2
  • Act 3

Episode 2 The Forgotten Song

  • Act 1
  • Act 2
  • Act 3
name: Vol. 1

description:
Featuring

Episode 3: The Pure Love Drug

&

Episode 4: The Night Before Leaving for War

Being a Death Messenger may not be the best way to get a date...

Chapter Titles

Episode 3 The Pure Love Drug

  • Act 1
  • Act 2
  • Act 3

Episode 4 The Night He Left for War

  • Act 1
  • Act 2
  • Act 3
name: Vol. 2

description:
Ed's clever plan to take out an enemy leaves him severely injured... Can he cheat death? One of our friends discovers the ironic secret behind Scar's brother's transmutation notes. And Major General Armstrong meets with evil homunculus President Bradley. Whose side is she on again...?

Plus, the disturbing origin of Ed and Al's immortal father finally revealed!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 74 - The Dwarf in the Flask
  • Chapter 75 - The Last Days of Cselkcess
  • Chapter 76 - Shape of a Person, Shape of a Stone
  • Chapter 77 - The Tables Are Turned; A New Transmutation Circle
  • Chapter 78 - The Seven Deadly Sins
name: Vol. 19

description:
Betrayal and double-crossing are the order of the day. Greed, Pride and Envy prove to be formidable enemies, but one homunculus seems to be having pangs of--could it be?--conscience. Ominous news spreads quickly about a mysterious portal. Will this gateway help the Elric brothers regain their natural bodies? And will the gigantic underground transmutation circle be completed, leading to a major regime change? Plus, a moving reunion between Al and someone from his past!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 79 - Bug Bite
  • Chapter 80 - The Prodigal Father Returns
  • Chapter 81 - A Full Recovery
  • Chapter 82 - Family By Spirit
  • Chapter 83 - The Promised Day
name: Vol. 20
